mapper.select: SELECT TOTAL_SEAT FROM DINING_TIME_SLOT WHERE DINING_ID = #{diningId} AND TO_CHAR(RESERVATION_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') = TO_CHAR(#{reservationTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')
SELECT NVL(RESERVED_COUNT, 0) FROM DINING_TIME_SLOT WHERE DINING_ID = #{diningId} AND TO_CHAR(RESERVATION_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') = TO_CHAR(#{reservationTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')
SELECT * FROM DINING_TIME_SLOT WHERE DINING_ID = #{diningId} AND TO_CHAR(RESERVATION_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') = TO_CHAR(#{reservationTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DINING_TIME_SLOT WHERE DINING_ID = #{diningId} AND TO_CHAR(RESERVATION_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') = TO_CHAR(#{reservationTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DINING_TIME_SLOT ( SLOT_ID, DINING_ID, RESERVATION_DATE, RESERVATION_TIME, RESERVED_COUNT, TOTAL_SEAT ) VALUES ( DINING_SLOT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{diningId}, #{reservationDate}, #{reservationTime}, #{reservedCount}, #{totalSeat} )
mapper.select: SELECT s.SLOT_ID AS slotId, s.DINING_ID AS diningId, d.DINING_NAME AS diningName, s.RESERVATION_DATE AS reservationDate, s.RESERVATION_TIME AS reservationTime, s.RESERVED_COUNT AS reservedCount, s.TOTAL_SEAT AS totalSeat FROM DINING_TIME_SLOT s JOIN DINING d ON s.DINING_ID = d.DINING_ID ORDER BY s.RESERVATION_DATE, s.RESERVATION_TIME
